name: Lone Stardust
description: Rewards can be redeemed at the Gift of Stardust Store
story:
The peculiar planet of Convergence-Î» possesses an elusive orbit, and its residents occasionally stare into the void, performing acts without logic. The IPC sent people to investigate, but their efforts were always met with one absurd reply: "Because I did it." The Intelligentsia Guild finally detected the influence of the Path of Equilibrium within the world's Crystallite, leading them to pose the crucial question:
"Where is your 'I'?"
"Here, and there."
They gestured to themselves, and to the nonexistent barycenter beyond their world, reaching out into the distant void...
"...They could never walk into the annihilating embrace of a binary star system, for they were never truly able to hold one another."

source.description: Available at the Jokes Come True store
